dmca.title: sweetmagnolia.com - Notification of DMCA Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Danna Thompson [mailto:dlthompson@verio.net] 
Sent: Thursday, July 28, 2005 4:40 PM
To: abuse@theplanet.com; legal@theplanet.com
Subject: sweetmagnolia.com - Notification of DMCA Copyright Infringement 


ATTN: The Planet - please confirm via email
 
* Also, please note that this site appears to be in violation of the Verio
Acceptable Use Policy
 
We have received the following notification of copyright infringement
regarding the site of one of your customers, www.sweetmagnolia.biz. In
accordance with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA), 17 U.S.C.
